404.description: Bad request (e.g. user not found or already verified).

put.summary: Update current user preferences using JWT

post.summary: Bulk create posts from CSV upload

postId.description: Optional: ID of the post to associate with

post.summary: Upload a media file (image or video) to Cloudinary

delete.summary: Delete a media file from Cloudinary and database

post.summary: Invite a member to the team

delete.summary: Remove a member from the team

get.summary: List delivery attempts for a webhook

info.title: YSHAI API
info.description: The YSHAI backend API documentation. This API manages posts, teams, media, AI generation, moderation, analytics, billing, and more.

timeFormat.description: Preferred time format of the user

language.description: BCP 47 language tag, e.g., en or ar

locale.description: Locale for formatting, e.g., en-US or ar-EG

contentEn.example: This is the post content in English

scheduleAt.description: Scheduled date and time for the post (ISO format)

isRecurring.description: Whether the post is part of a recurring schedule

socialAccountIds.description: IDs of the social accounts to post to (optional, multi-target)

scheduleAt.description: When you plan to publish this draft

email.description: Email of the user to invite

role.description: Role to assign to the invited member
New role for the team member

imageUrl.description: Publicly accessible image URL to moderate

videoUrl.description: Publicly accessible video URL to moderate

imageUrl.description: Image URL for alt text generation

accessToken.description: Short-lived access token from the provider

refreshToken.description: Long-lived refresh token from the provider

secret.description: Shared secret to sign webhook payloads
